laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. Reference Range-Negative.
Acute peripancreatic fluid collections with the largest measures: 1.5 x 3.8 cm and another 2.5 x 7.3 cm, which has increased significantly in size from previous.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The peripancreatic fluid collections have increased significantly in size from previous.
